response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. We are confident that this investment will provide substantial returns and meet your requirements. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 950000}
